t: Tile Bond
s: A Cement based, rapid setting thin or thick bed adhesive for floor and wall tiles. Used to bond ceramic, quarry tiles, mosaics, stone cladding and brick slips. If SBR polymer is used setting times will increase. Grey only. Can be used internally or externally.
